mapper.sql: ID, ZJQDID, FJZCH, BJLX, JH, XLH, DJXMID, DJBH, ZWMS, ZT, WHSJ, DPRTCODE
mapper.select:
update b_s_00303
rwid=#{rwid},
jkbz=#{jkbz},
ID = id
where ID = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.djbh, t1.bjlx, t1.djxmid, t1.zwms, t1.jh, t1.fjzch, (CASE WHEN t5.zwms IS NULL THEN t3.zwmc ELSE t5.zwms END) zwmc, (CASE WHEN t5.ywms IS NULL THEN t3.ywmc ELSE t5.ywms END) ywmc, t1.xlh, t1.dprtcode, t3.wz, t3.gdid, t1.rwid, t4.rwdh, t4.xggdid, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t4.whrid) whrxm, to_char(t4.whsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') whsj, t1.jkbz, t2.zyxs, t6.dprtname from b_s_00303 t1 left join b_g_012 t2 on t1.djxmid = t2.id join b_s_003 t3 on t1.zjqdid = t3.id and t3.zt=1 left join b_s_009 t4 on t1.rwid = t4.id and t4.zt in (1,2) left join d_008 t5 on t3.jh = t5.bjh and t5.zt=1 and t3.dprtcode = t5.dprtcode left join t_department t6 on t1.dprtcode=t6.id
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select t5.id bjid, t1.id, t1.zjqdid, t1.djbh, t1.bjlx, t1.djxmid, t1.zwms, t1.jh, t1.fjzch, (CASE WHEN t5.zwms IS NULL THEN t3.zwmc ELSE t5.zwms END) zwmc, (CASE WHEN t5.ywms IS NULL THEN t3.ywmc ELSE t5.ywms END) ywmc, t1.xlh, t1.dprtcode, t3.wz, t3.gdid, t1.rwid, t4.rwdh, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t4.whrid) whrxm, to_char(t4.whsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') whsj, t1.jkbz, t2.zyxs, t6.dprtname from b_s_00303 t1 left join b_g_012 t2 on t1.djxmid = t2.id join b_s_003 t3 on t1.zjqdid = t3.id left join b_s_009 t4 on t1.rwid = t4.id left join d_008 t5 on t3.jh = t5.bjh and t5.zt=1 and t3.dprtcode = t5.dprtcode left join t_department t6 on t1.dprtcode=t6.id
